meanings.definition: The coarse hair of a camel, used for making clothing or other textiles.
meanings.sent1: The camelhairs were spun into yarn for weaving.
meanings.sent2: She wore a soft camelhair sweater to keep warm.
meanings.sent3: The camelhairs decided to start a fashion line.
meanings.sent4: The camelhairs in the fabric added a rugged touch to the design.
meanings.sent5: The texture of camelhairs against the skin felt rough but durable.

meanings.definition: A garment made from camelhair fabric.
meanings.sent1: He bought a luxurious camelhair coat for the winter.
meanings.sent2: The camelhairs of the scarf felt cozy around her neck.
meanings.sent3: The camelhairs went on a trip to the desert, wearing their camelhair outfits.
meanings.sent4: Her camelhair dress flowed like sand in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The camelhair garment was as warm as a hug from a desert sun.
